title: The Apostle
subject_group: Crime, Espionage, Justice, Police & Prisons/Crime passionnel
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Men - Psychology
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Spirituality
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Self-actualization (Psychology)
description: Robert Duvall wrote, directed and stars in this tale of a deeply troubled Southern Pentecostal preacher, Sonny, which explores issues of spirituality and faith. Sonny is a gifted preacher much loved by his community, but after he loses control and commits a crime of passion, he is forced to flee from the law. Settling in the small town of Bay Boutte, he adopts a new identity and sets out on a new mission - to find the road to redemption. Cast includes: Robert Duvall, Farrah Fawcett, Miranda Richardson, Todd Allen and Billy Bob Thornton.
